name: Device Offboarding Manager
description: A PowerShell-based GUI application for streamlined device lifecycle management across Microsoft cloud services. Enables bulk device offboarding from Intune, Autopilot, and Entra ID from a single interface. Features real-time dashboard analytics, stale device tracking, automatic BitLocker and FileVault key retrieval, CSV/TXT import for bulk operations, and pre-built playbooks for automated workflows.
author: Ugur Koc
